akn:section.akn:heading: Acceptance of funds for harbor dredging

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 701h–4. Acceptance of funds for harbor dredging The Secretary is authorized, in accordance with section 701h of this title, to accept and expend funds contributed by a State or other non-Federal interest—(1) to dredge a non-Federal harbor or channel, or a marina or berthing area located adjacent to, or accessible by, such harbor or channel; or
(2) to provide technical assistance related to the planning and design of dredging activities described in paragraph (1).
(Pub. L. 116–260, div. AA, title I, § 144, Dec. 27, 2020, 134 Stat. 2653.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries
“Secretary” Defined Secretary means the Secretary of the Army, see section 2 of div. AA of Pub. L. 116–260, set out as a note under section 2201 of this title.
(1) to dredge a non-Federal harbor or channel, or a marina or berthing area located adjacent to, or accessible by, such harbor or channel; or
(2) to provide technical assistance related to the planning and design of dredging activities described in paragraph (1).
